description: This command line patterns found in BlackByte Ransomware operations Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: BlackByte Ransomware Patterns
query: ((process.executable:C\:\\Users\\Public\\* AND process.command_line:*\ \-single\ *) OR process.command_line:(*del\ C\:\\Windows\\System32\\Taskmgr.exe* OR *;Set\-Service\ \-StartupType\ Disabled\ $* OR *powershell\ \-command\ \"$x\ \=\[System.Text.Encoding\]\:\:Unicode.GetString\(\[System.Convert\]\:\:FromBase64String\(* OR *\ do\ start\ wordpad.exe\ \/p\ *))
